text: Riverside High School was a public high school in Chattanooga, Tennessee, operating from 1963 - 1983.https://csasupper.hcde.org/our_history Its building currently houses the Chattanooga School for the Arts and Sciences - Upper School. ==Notable alumni== * Samuel L. Jackson, actor and director * Mike Jones (wide receiver, born 1960), NFL player * Rich Fuqua, former college basketball stand-out * Anthony Roberts (basketball) ==References== Category:1983 disestablishments
title: Riverside High School (Chattanooga, Tennessee)
